import Exercise from '../../components/Exercise';

> **Example tag bundle**
> - `demonstration` – Learners watch a worked example before trying it.
> - `assessment` – Used for quizzes, take-home practice, or study guides.

> Difficulty and estimated time surface in the Topic layout chips. Tag options reuse the lesson discovery list:
> `activity`, `demonstration`, `reading`, `lab`, `assessment`.

<Exercise
  prompt={<>
    Describe how you would detect light pollution using only a paper star chart and the night sky.
  </>}
  hint={<>
    Focus on relative brightness: compare the faintest stars you can see in two directions.
  </>}
  solution={<>
    Record which magnitude markers disappear from the chart in each direction and log the time, location, and weather.
  </>}
/>

Offer follow-up discussion prompts, extension problems, or rubric notes.
